name: mongo-generator
description: TDM custom action example for inserting data into MongoDB

scripts.build: echo "Build with TSC ..." && rm -rf dist && tsc
scripts.test: echo "Testing with ts-node ..." && mocha -r ts-node/register test/*.spec.ts
scripts.start: echo "Nothing to start. The script is started by TDM action service via REST. Try 'test' target." && exit 1
